temples.name: Mesa Arizona Temple
temples.address: 101 S LeSueur Mesa AZ 85204-1031 United States
temples.services: Clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, No patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The Mesa Arizona Temple is the seventh operating temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Located in the city of Mesa, Arizona, it is the first of six LDS temples built or planned in the state. (Information from Wikipedia)
temples.closures: Tuesday, 5 April 2022 - Saturday, 16 April 2022 (Limited Operations), Monday, 18 July 2022 - Monday, 1 August 2022 Saturday, 1 October 2022 Wednesday, 23 November 2022 (Limited Operations) Thursday, 24 November 2022 Saturday, 24 December 2022
